verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen<s%> now to what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> your case before the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and let the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> what you have to <S%H6963>say.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> you <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H7379>controversy,<s%> and you <S%H386>enduring<s%> <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he will <S%H3198>contend<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
My <S%H5971>people,<s%> what have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3811>you?<s%> How have I burdened <S%H6030>you?<s%> Answer me!

For I brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> now what <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3289>devised,<s%> and what <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him from <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> acts of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

How shall I come <S%H6923>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3721>bow<s%> myself before the <S%H4791>exalted<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> Shall I come <S%H6923>before<s%> him with burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> with <S%H5695>calves<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old?<s%>

Will <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H352>rams?<s%> With tens of <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H8081>oil?<s%> Shall I <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> for my <S%H6588>disobedience?<s%> The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of my <S%H990>body<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul?<s%>

He has <S%H5046>shown<s%> <S%H120>you,<s%> O man, what is <S%H2896>good.<s%> What does <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> of <S%H6213>you,<s%> but to act <S%H4941>justly,<s%> to <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6800>humbly<s%> with your <S%H430>God?<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> your <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and he who appointed <S%H3259>it.<s%>

Are <S%H786>there<s%> yet <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and a <S%H7332>short<s%> <S%H374>ephah<s%> that is <S%H2194>accursed?<s%>
Shall I be <S%H2135>pure<s%> with <S%H7562>dishonest<s%> <S%H3976>scales,<s%> and with a <S%H3599>bag<s%> of <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H68>weights?<s%>

Her rich <S%H6223>men<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence,<s%> her <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> in their <S%H6310>speech.<s%>
Therefore I also have <S%H2470>struck<s%> you with a grievous <S%H5221>wound.<s%> I have made you <S%H8074>desolate<s%> because of your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> but not be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%> Your <S%H3445>humiliation<s%> will be in your <S%H7130>midst.<s%> You will store <S%H5253>up,<s%> but not <S%H6403>save;<s%> and that which you <S%H6403>save<s%> I will give <S%H5414>up<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

You will <S%H2232>sow,<s%> but <S%H7114>won't<s%> reap. You will <S%H1869>tread<s%> the <S%H2132>olives,<s%> but <S%H5480>won't<s%> anoint yourself with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and crush <S%H8492>grapes,<s%> but <S%H8354>won't<s%> drink the <S%H8492>wine.<s%>

For the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> are <S%H8104>kept,<s%> and all the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab.<s%> You <S%H3212>walk<s%> in their <S%H4156>counsels,<s%> that I may <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H8047>ruin,<s%> and her <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> a <S%H8322>hissing;<s%> And you will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
